title: Conditional Prior-based Non-stationary Channel Estimation Using Accelerated Diffusion Models
summary: This work proposes conditional prior diffusion for channel estimation in motion-rich urban microcell (UMi) settings, where wireless channels are non-stationary and mobility and scatterer dynamics shift the distribution over time. A temporal encoder with cross-time attention compresses a short observation window into a context vector, capturing the channel's instantaneous coherence.
